rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Conforta me rex sanctorum principatum tenens et da
sermonem rectum et benesonantem in os meum sermonem rectum in ore meo

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody:
Da nobis domine locum paenitentiae
et ne claudas et ne claudas
ora canentium ora clamantium ora laudantium te domine

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-M CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-L Hyd
